EmailTemplate.name: PREPARE No Show (bilingual)
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
According to our records, you missed {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} on {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. Participation in this training is mandatory to complete the PREPARE for Care program. Please contact prepareforcare@imaginewa.org to discuss potential ways to catch up with program requirements.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
----
Estimado {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Según nuestros registros, usted se perdió la capacitación de {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} en {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. La participación en esta capacitación es obligatoria para completar el programa PREPARE for Care. Por favor contacte con prepareforcare@imaginewa.org para discutir posibles formas de ponerse al día con los requisitos del programa.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
